title: 'Signalgate' - Defense Secretary Leaked War Plans
summary: Defense Secretary Hegseth shared sensitive military attack plans via Signal. Atlantic editor Jeffrey Goldberg accidentally added to Signal chat. Shared real-time Yemen strike details: aircraft types, launch times, targets. Messages included: 'THIS IS WHEN THE FIRST BOMBS WILL DEFINITELY DROP'. Also shared classified info with wife, brother, personal lawyer. Pentagon IG: 'Risked compromising sensitive military information,' 'could have endangered U.S. troops.' Hegseth refused IG interview. Administration called damning IG report a 'TOTAL exoneration.'
